mapper.select: SELECT song.NAME songName, singer.NAME singerName, song.album songAlbum, song.pic songPic, song.url songUrl, song.lyric songLyric, play_history.play_time FROM play_history LEFT JOIN song ON play_history.song_id = song.id LEFT JOIN singer ON song.singer_id = singer.id WHERE play_history.user_id = ${userId} ORDER BY play_history.play_time DESC
